code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Section.css';import'../App.css';import GitHubContributionsChart from'./GitHubContributionsChart';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const projects=[{title:'SOLWEIG-GPU: GPU-Accelerated Thermal Comfort Modeling Framework',description:'SOLWEIG-GPU is a Python package and command-line interface for running the SOLWEIG (Solar and LongWave Environmental Irradiance Geometry) model on CPU or GPU (if available). It enables high-resolution urban microclimate modeling by computing key variables such as Sky View Factor (SVF), Mean Radiant Temperature (Tmrt), and the Universal Thermal Climate Index (UTCI)',image:'/images/UTCI_New_Delhi.jpeg',link:'https://github.com/nvnsudharsan/SOLWEIG-GPU'},{title:'Comparison of AI and Physics based models for Hurricane Track Prediction at Realtime',description:'Improving hurricane track prediction with deep learning.',image:'/images/hurricane.png',link:'/research/hurricane'},{title:'Heat Risk Assessment',description:'High-resolution flood prediction using coupled models.',image:'/images/risk.png',link:'/research/flood'},{title:'Projection of Heatwaves',description:'High-resolution flood prediction using coupled models.',image:'/images/heatwave_pdf.png',link:'/research/flood'},{title:'Hurricane Precipitation Climatology',description:'High-resolution flood prediction using coupled models.',image:'/images/hurricane_clim.png',link:'/research/flood'},{title:'Coastal Risk Assessment',description:'High-resolution flood prediction using coupled models.',image:'/images/hurricane_clim.png',link:'/research/flood'},{title:'Near Real-Time Forecasting of Hurricanes using AI models',description:'High-resolution flood prediction using coupled models.',image:'/images/hurricane_clim.png',link:'/research/flood'}];function Research(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{fontSize:'2.5rem'},children:"Research"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:project.link,className:"tile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.image,alt:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description})]},index))})]})});}export default Research;
